div.p: Flag_of_North_Korea.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 1,600 × 800 pixels, file size: 873 B)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

a.title: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

img.alt: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: top; padding-right: 0.4em; width: 15%

td.div: Aragonés: Bandera de Corea d'o Norte.
Български: Национално знаме на Северна Корея.
ইমার ঠার/বিষ্ণুপ্রিয়া মণিপুরী: ঔয়াং কোরিয়ার ফিরালহান.
Català: Bandera de Corea del Nord.
Español: Bandera de Corea del Norte.
Français : Drapeau de la Corée du Nord.
Galego: Bandeira de Corea do Norte.
Italiano: Bandiera della Corea del Nord.
日本語: 朝鮮民主主義人民共和国の国旗.
Português: Bandeira da Coreia do Norte.
ไทย: ธงชาติเกาหลีเหนือ.

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; white-space: nowrap

td.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; font-weight: bold

table.style: border:2px solid #d3d3d3; background-color:white; clear: both; margin: 0.5em auto; width:100%; text-align:center; cellpadding:0px; direction:ltr;

tr.td: It is easy to put a border around this image:

p.span: العربية | Беларуская (тарашкевіца) | Català | Česky | Dansk | Deutsch | Ελληνικά | English | Esperanto | Español | Eesti | Euskara | Suomi | Français | Galego | Hrvatski | Magyar | Հայերեն | Bahasa Indonesia | Italiano | 日本語 | ქართული | 한국어 | Lietuvių | Македонски | Bahasa Melayu | Malti | Nederlands | ‪Norsk (bokmål)‬ | Polski | Português | Runa Simi | Română | Русский | Slovenčina | Српски / Srpski | Svenska | Türkçe | 中文 | ‪中文(简体)‬ | ‪中文(繁體)‬ | +/−

td.span: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:07, 12 July 2010

td.span: (http://ifes.kyungnam.ac.kr/admin/upload_File/document/%EC%A1%B0%EC%84%A0%EB%AF%BC%EC%A3%BC%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%98%EC%9D%B8%EB%AF%BC%EA%B3%B5%ED%99%94%EA%B5%AD%20%EA%B5%AD%EA%B8%B0%EB%B2%95.doc is the construction law (text only, trying to get paper form with t)

Thumbnail for version as of 22:18, 2 July 2010
Thumbnail for version as of 22:15, 2 July 2010

td.span: (new colours based of images from Air Koryo)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 01:33, 17 August 2009

td.span: (Compressed the image, combined some elements together.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:13, 11 October 2005

td.span: (I finally decided to use the colors from http://www.kcckp.net/en/, the official web portal of the DPRK.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:07, 11 October 2005

td.span: (I tried to copy the colors that were used on the "official" DPRK website, not sure if that worked.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:19, 28 September 2005
